name: Shadrix
description: A mysterious shadow-type GitMon that lurks in the depths of your codebase, finding hidden vulnerabilities and stealth bugs.

name: Fairy
description: A fierce fire-type GitMon with blazing hot compilation speeds. Burns through legacy code and ignites new innovations.

name: Crystalix
description: A cool ice-type GitMon that freezes bugs in their tracks and maintains crystal-clear code architecture.

name: Guarana
description: A nature-loving grass-type GitMon that grows organic, sustainable code and nurtures healthy development environments.

name: Volterra
description: An energetic electric-type GitMon that supercharges your builds and electrifies performance optimizations.

name: Aquarus
description: A fluid water-type GitMon that flows seamlessly through continuous integration and keeps your deployment pipeline flowing smoothly.

name: Infernus
description: An intense fire-type GitMon that forges robust applications in the flames of rigorous testing and quality assurance.

name: Lumenis
description: A bright grass-type GitMon that illuminates clean code practices and cultivates thriving open-source communities.

name: Spectra
description: A psychic-type GitMon with mind-reading debugging abilities. Predicts bugs before they happen and telepathically optimizes code.
